title: Drifting
lyrics:
If I'm driftin', say that you will be there
Hope you listen, say your name as my prayer
In the deep end, head above to breathe air
If I'm driftin', say that you will be there

(Say that you will be there, say that you will be there)
(Say that you will be there, say that you will be there)

If I'm driftin', say that you will be there
Hope you listen, say your name as my prayer
In the deep end, head above to breathe air
If I'm driftin', say that you will be there

(Say that you will be there, say that you will be there)
